p: We ran 18 sessions in two batches with 255 participants in 2017, involving the first batch in June with 11 sessions and the second batch in August with seven sessions. Each session had a maximum of 23 participants and only one treatment. The participants were Norwegian-speaking students at the University of Stavanger who were recruited through an e-mail sent to all students at the university. Table 2 summarizes the characteristics of the participants in different conditions.
